ctx: intros p q a b Hcan1 Hcan2.
exceptions.exn: Found no subterm matching "olist (A:=A) ltM (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a p)" in the current goal.

ctx: intros p q a b Hcan1 Hcan2.
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) p, q : list (Term A n) a, b : Term A n Hcan1 : olist (A:=A) ltM (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a p) /\\ nZterm A0 eqA (n:=n) p /\\ ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) a Hcan2 : olist (A:=A) ltM (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) b q) /\\ nZterm A0 eqA (n:=n) q /\\ ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) b Unable to unify "?M1861 = ?M1861 \\/ (fix In (a : ?M1860) (l : list ?M1860) {struct l} : Prop := match l with | nil => False | b :: m => b = a \\/ In a m end) ?M1861 ?M1862" with "(fix In (a : Term A n) (l : list (Term A n)) {struct l} : Prop := match l with | nil => False | b :: m => b = a \\/ In a m end) (multTerm multA (n:=n) a b) (multpf (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a p) (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) b q))".

original: intros p q a b Hcan1 Hcan2. unfold canonical in Hcan1, Hcan2. simpl in Hcan1, Hcan2. rewrite Hcan1, Hcan2. apply in_eq.
